Name: DREAMFLIGHT VR
About the game: You close your eyes and when you open them again, you wake up in a new world full of magic. Decide for yourself whether you prefer, to fly on the back of an eagle or would you rather be the pilot. This game is perfect after a hard day's work. Put your Oculus Rift on and relax . Full XBox360 Controller Compatible OCULUS SDK 0.8.0.0
